医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
孟德尔随机化研究中优先考虑生物动机方法孟德尔随机化是医学研究中的一个强大工具，可以帮助我们了解某些因素是否真正导致疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Prioritizing-biologically-motivated-approaches-in-Mendelian-randomization-studies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Prioritizing-biologically-motivated-approaches-in-Mendelian-randomization-studies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=192b7d1d-ab11-4c99-931c-bc30f69fce90 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 23:38:37 -0500 Prioritizing biologically motivated approaches in Mendelian randomization studies
微生物特征与癌症免疫治疗反应相关微生物组可以识别那些受益于多种不同癌症的联合免疫疗法的患者，包括罕见的妇科癌症、胆道癌和黑色素瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Microbial-signatures-linked-to-immunotherapy-response-across-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Microbial-signatures-linked-to-immunotherapy-response-across-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05e7fb81-0435-4312-98e0-236b9a56c7a9 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 21:47:34 -0500 Microbial signatures linked to immunotherapy response across cancers
研究揭示有目的的步行对全髋关节置换术患者的好处伯恩茅斯大学科学家的一篇研究论文提出了一项随机试点试验，旨在确定以户外步行距离为目标的干预措施的效果，以增加老年人在术后 3 至 6 个月使用商业活动监测仪的日常活动。全髋关节置换术（THR）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Study-reveals-benefits-of- Purposeful-walking-for-total-hip-replacement-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Study-reveals-benefits-of- Purposeful-walking-for-total-hip-replacement-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=76889366-d99d-40ec-8b83-6e0ea08db572 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 15:34:00 -0500 Study reveals benefits of purposeful walking for total hip replacement patients
MRI 监测可降低 BRCA1 突变女性的乳腺癌死亡率Sant Pau 研究所临床肿瘤学小组参与的一项发表在《JAMA 肿瘤学》杂志上的国际研究表明，对 BRCA1 基因突变的女性进行 MRI 监测可显着降低乳腺癌死亡率，而无需进行预防性乳房切除术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/MRI-monitoring-reduces-breast-cancer-mortality-in-women-with-BRCA1-mutations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/MRI-monitoring-reduces-breast-cancer-mortality-in-women-with-BRCA1-mutations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1a64765-551b-474c-9a8d-dd77f88294de Fri, 01 Mar 2024 15:22:00 -0500 MRI monitoring reduces breast cancer mortality in women with BRCA1 mutations
广谱中和抗体 mAb-39 针对 SARS-CoV-2 中保守的 S2 表位由 SARS-CoV-2 引起的持续的 COVID-19 大流行对公共卫生和全球经济造成了严重损害，对抗 COVID-19 的一项策略是开发用于预防和治疗用途的广泛中和抗体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Broad-spectrum-neutralizing-antibody-mAb-39-targets-conserved-S2-epitope-in​​-SARS-CoV-2.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Broad-spectrum-neutralizing-antibody-mAb-39-targets-conserved-S2-epitope-in​​-SARS-CoV-2.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b22363b-4bee-43fe-90de-bc3d14dfe1e4 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 15:12:00 -0500 Broad-spectrum neutralizing antibody mAb-39 targets conserved S2 epitope in SARS-CoV-2
解开自闭症和智力障碍的分子奥秘麦吉尔大学和范德比尔特大学研究人员团队的一项新研究揭示了我们对某些形式自闭症和智力障碍的分子起源的理解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Unlocking-the-molecular-mysteries-of-autism-and-intellectual-disability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Unlocking-the-molecular-mysteries-of-autism-and-intellectual-disability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0fbbc0e8-8596-4eb2-9313-bc3aec295472 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 15:05:00 -0500 Unlocking the molecular mysteries of autism and intellectual disability
宾夕法尼亚大学工程师利用脂质纳米颗粒开发靶向肺部输送系统宾夕法尼亚大学工程师开发了一种用脂质纳米颗粒 (LNP) 靶向肺部的新方法，这是 Moderna 和辉瑞 BioNTech COVID-19 疫苗用来传递 mRNA 的微型胶囊，为囊性纤维化等肺部疾病的新疗法打开了大门。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Penn-engineers-develop-targeted-lung-delivery-system-using-lipid-nanoarticles.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Penn-engineers-develop-targeted-lung-delivery-system-using-lipid-nanoarticles.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93f5340e-2b8c-49eb-9baf-2bef82dac415 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 14:54:00 -0500 Penn engineers develop targeted lung delivery system using lipid nanoparticles
科学家发现人类疱疹病毒8诱发癌症的关键机制克利夫兰诊所的研究人员发现了卡波西肉瘤相关疱疹病毒 (KSHV)（也称为人类疱疹病毒 8 (HHV8)）诱发癌症的关键机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Scientists-discover-a-key-mechanism-used-by- human-herpesvirus-8-to-induce-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Scientists-discover-a-key-mechanism-used-by- human-herpesvirus-8-to-induce-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df7de39c-3ec9-4ba0-aca8-80e5590f2af6 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 14:47:32 -0500 Scientists discover a key mechanism used by human herpesvirus 8 to induce cancer
研究显示孕妇 omega-3 摄入量较低，尽管对健康有益一项新的全国队列研究的结果表明，尽管强烈建议食用 omega-3 脂肪酸以实现最佳妊娠结局和后代健康，但 25% 的参与者表示在怀孕期间很少或从不吃鱼，服用 omega-3 的人数较少补充品。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Study-reveals-low-omega-3-intake-among-pregnant-women-despite-health-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Study-reveals-low-omega-3-intake-among-pregnant-women-despite-health-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62b332f2-8e9c-4d56-8bf0-6e13789c0fa7 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 14:40:41 -0500 Study reveals low omega-3 intake among pregnant women despite health benefits
新发现的抗体针对流感病毒难以发现的区域美国国立卫生研究院的研究人员发现了针对流感病毒难以发现的区域的抗体，揭示了神经氨酸酶（NA）蛋白头相对未被探索的“黑暗面”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Newly-identified-antibodies-target-a-hard-to-spot-region-of-the-influenza-virus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Newly-identified-antibodies-target-a-hard-to-spot-region-of-the-influenza-virus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff1696a3-b568-437c-a59e-6e1713ceaa42 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 14:36:02 -0500 Newly identified antibodies target a hard-to-spot region of the influenza virus
